name: KaboomLink
description:
KaboomLink was a game made in 48 hours for the GMTK Game Jam 2021.

All assets were made by FireBlaze236 except the sound effects.

Links : Bfxr 

Genre : Tower Defense, Action, Shooter, Zombies

Art, Animations, Programming and Music : FireBlaze236

Guide:

Mouse to rotate the player

Left-Mouse : Shoot chained bullets

Left/Right or A/D : Rotation direction for the poles

Mouse Wheel : Change Bullet Speed

Try linking the poles together!

Try alternating different bullet speeds!

Killing the enemies with explosions = 2 points

Killing the enemies with just bullet hits = 1 point

There are a lot of tricks with the chained bullets and bullet speed.

Submit Your highscore: https://forms.gle/7xFCrVRYcgPiyFGN7

Leaderboard will be published after the jam results!
